channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Boston Athenaeum and Old North Church Make the Hub’s Past Come Alive

item.title: The Perfect Neighbor Makes All The Right Points The Director Didn’t Mean To
item.description: It's a documentary worth watching, but not for the intended reasons.

item.title: Why the App Store Freedom Act Undercuts Innovation
item.description: Top-down mandates for app marketplaces threaten free markets, investor incentives, and the very security frameworks that support them.

item.title: Left-Wing Cultural Revolutionaries Are Decapitating Statues And Calling It Art
item.description: When they told you Confederate statues were going to museums, you didn't know they meant this.

item.title: Basic Economics Comes for the Music Industry
item.description: Ticket prices will remain high until fans stop paying them.

item.title: Apparently, We Still Need to Explain Why Communism Is Wrong
item.description: The good news is that we still have the antidote to all the nonsense out there.

item.title: Trump says training to use Tomahawk missiles would take too long in decision not to arm Ukraine
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday said he didn't give Tomahawk missiles to Ukraine because it would take too long to train them to use them.

item.title: Leftists Downplay Dem’s Nazi Tattoo After Calling Hegseth’s Christian Ink ‘White Nationalist’
item.description: The media went hysterical over Pete Hegseth's Jerusalem Cross tattoo but are much less concerned about Graham Platner's Nazi symbol.

item.title: No, Trump Isn’t Destroying the White House
item.description: Good grief, people. Pull yourselves together.
